backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor with health check, authorization mixin, user approval state, data models, and comparison utilities for designs and orders.
feature_evidence.json: Describes feature evidence for PDF order parsing and ingestion preview updates, including affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists short summaries of key frontend files covering routing, hooks, dashboards, ingestion flow, and error handling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme variables for light and dark modes with custom design tokens.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point loading the main React application.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, theme colors, and icons.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker handling caching, fetch interception, and cache cleanup for offline support.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app router and bootstrap logic with authentication, profile loading, timeout watchdog, and error handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: UI screen shown when the user lacks permission to access a route.
frontend/src/components/auth/BootstrapEr: Error screen for failed bootstrap with retry and logout actions plus detailed error info.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button integrating Internet Identity with state handling and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/NoProfileBl: Displays a screen for authenticated users without a profile, showing their principal ID and copy/refresh options.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal for first-time admin users to enter their name and complete initial profile setup.
frontend/src/components/auth/RoleGate.ts: Restricts access to children components based on allowed user roles, showing an access-denied screen otherwise.
frontend/src/components/errors/AppErrorB: Global React error boundary that shows a friendly error screen with reload and logout options.
frontend/src/components/errors/ErrorDeta: Collapsible panel showing technical error details with a copy-to-clipboard option.
frontend/src/components/errors/InlineErr: Inline error alert displaying a message, optional retry button, and detailed technical error info.
frontend/src/components/exports/ExportAc: Provides a dropdown menu to export orders in various formats using exportOrders.
Main application shell with role‑based navigation, mobile menu, and status indicators.
frontend/src/components/masterDesigns/Ma: Dialog for adding or editing master design mappings, handling form submission and validation.
Dialog for uploading and parsing master design files, showing results and importing parsed entries.
Displays master designs in a table with edit and activate/deactivate actions.
frontend/src/components/orders/Ingestion: Renders a preview of ingested orders, highlighting unmapped design codes and key order fields.
frontend/src/components/orders/OrdersFil: Provides filter controls for orders including karigar, date range, CO flag, and status.
frontend/src/components/orders/OrdersTab: Shows detailed order rows with optional status update selector and customer‑order highlighting.
frontend/src/components/status/BackendSt: Header indicator showing backend online/offline state with refresh, error details, and canister ID display.
frontend/src/components/status/Connectiv: Displays online/offline status and pending sync info, offering a manual sync button when online with queued uploads.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendReachabilit: Periodically performs backend health checks, classifying errors and exposing reachability status and health data.
frontend/src/hooks/useCopyToClipboard.ts: Provides clipboard copy functionality with status tracking and dynamic button labels.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Fetches the current user profile via a safe actor, handling auth errors and retry logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, loading identities and providing login/clear actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of data-fetching and mutation hooks for orders, master designs, and unmapped codes using the safe actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useSafeActor.ts: Safely creates a backend actor with timeout and optional access-control setup, exposing status and errors.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining light/dark theme CSS variables and global element styling.
frontend/src/lib/exports/ordersExport.ts: Filters orders by type and exports them as a downloadable CSV using dynamically generated filenames.
frontend/src/lib/mapping/applyMasterDesi: Maps orders to master design entries using normalized design codes and fills missing fields while tracking unmapped items.
frontend/src/lib/mapping/normalizeDesign: Normalizes design codes by trimming whitespace and collapsing internal spaces.
frontend/src/lib/orders/deriveMetrics.ts: Computes aggregate order metrics including totals and karigar-wise breakdowns.
frontend/src/lib/orders/formatKarigarNam: Formats karigar names, returning 'Unassigned' when empty.
Determines if an order type represents a customer order based on substring matching.
frontend/src/lib/orders/sortOrdersDesign: Sorts orders by normalized design code and then by order number.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/excel/parseMast: Parses master design entries from an Excel workbook with flexible header handling and validation.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/excel/parseOrde: Parses orders from an Excel workbook, validating required columns and converting rows into Order objects.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/excel/readWorkb: Loads the XLSX library if needed and reads an uploaded Excel file into a SheetJS workbook.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/masterDesignPar: Dispatches master design parsing to PDF or Excel handlers and returns parsed design mappings.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/orderParser.ts: Parses order files from PDF or Excel, delegating to format-specific parsers and returning Order objects.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/pdf/extractText: Loads PDF.js from CDN and extracts structured text lines from each PDF page.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/pdf/parseMaster: Parses design code entries from extracted PDF lines using header detection and row splitting.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/pdf/parseOrders: Parses orders from PDF text, tracking karigar headers and converting lines into Order objects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/offline/db.ts: Defines IndexedDB storage for offline orders, master designs, sync queue, and metadata.
frontend/src/offline/sync.ts: React hook that syncs queued offline ingestions to backend and updates cache state.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard showing orders, metrics, date filtering, tables, and export options.
frontend/src/pages/admin/MasterDesignsPa: Displays master design mappings with search, add, import, and edit functionality using dialogs and a table.
frontend/src/pages/admin/UserManagementP: Provides a form to create user profiles with validation, role selection, and error handling for canister issues.
frontend/src/pages/karigar/KarigarDashbo: Shows karigar-specific metrics and assigned orders, handling loading, error states, and sorted order display.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Renders the login screen with branding and an Internet Identity login button.
frontend/src/pages/setup/BootstrapAdminP: Handles one-time admin initialization via a bootstrap token and triggers actor reinitialization before redirecting.
frontend/src/pages/staff/IngestOrdersPag: Parses uploaded order files, applies master design mappings, previews results, and uploads mapped and unmapped orders with error handling.
frontend/src/pages/staff/StaffDashboardP: Displays all orders with filtering, sorting, exporting, and an option to navigate to the order ingestion workflow.
frontend/src/pages/staff/UnmappedDesignC: React page listing unmapped design codes, supporting search, grouping, and opening a form dialog to add mappings.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers the service worker on page load and logs success or failure.
frontend/src/utils/bootstrapErrorClassif: Classifies bootstrap errors into stopped-canister, network, or generic categories and extracts safe error details.
frontend/src/utils/errorPresentation.ts: Transforms errors into user-friendly messages using bootstrap classification and exposes helpers for stopped-canister messaging.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with session persistence and hash-routing support.
frontend/src/utils/withTimeout.ts: Wraps a promise with a timeout, rejecting with a timeout error if it exceeds the specified duration.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration defining theme extensions, plugins, and styling tokens.
project_state.json: Project state file describing system goals, architecture notes, issues, and existing features for build planning.
